meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the earliest eon of geological history, preceding the Proterozoic eon.
meanings.sent1: The archean rocks are very old and hold many secrets of the past.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study archean formations to learn about the Earth's ancient history.
meanings.sent3: The archean mountains whispered stories of the distant past to the curious hikers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for history was as deep and enduring as the archean rocks.
meanings.sent5: The archean landscape painted a picture of a world long forgotten.

meanings.definition: A member of the Archean eon.
meanings.sent1: The archean lived in a time when the Earth was very different.
meanings.sent2: Fossils of archeans help us understand life in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The archean chuckled at the modern world's fast pace, reminiscing about simpler days.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an archean in a world of rapid change, a relic of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The archean's wisdom was as timeless as the rocks of their eon.
